existing_features.title: Debug and fix the 'Error loading door entries. Please try again.' error displayed in the DoorEntryList component by investigating the useQuery hook for fetching door entries and ensuring proper error handling and retry logic
Debug and fix the 'Error loading totals. Please try again.' error displayed in the GrandTotals component by investigating the useQuery hook for calculating totals and ensuring proper error handling
Verify backend actor availability and ensure the getAllTypes and getTotalSquareFeet methods are functioning correctly and accessible from the frontend queries

projectName: Fix door entries and totals loading errors
